entry.title: Introduction to OSAlt

  • squirrel-army A documentation repository and contribution to be build out by the community on infomration about ADD, coping mechanism and other items contributed by our home grown squirrel army.
  • secret-santa Open source python project for matching individuals to their secret santa group by geographical region.
  • scripts-utils Tools to â€¦
entry.content:
Project Listing:

  • squirrel-army A documentation repository and contribution to be build out by the community on infomration about ADD, coping mechanism and other items contributed by our home grown squirrel army.
  • secret-santa Open source python project for matching individuals to their secret santa group by geographical region.
  • scripts-utils Tools to be build out for the GeekBeacon community
  • nya-chan-bot A cute small bot not using any framework that drives some of the new functionality of GB Discord. A collaboration of several nerdy little penguins.

Deprecated Project (Pre-Nixie Resurection)

  • osalt-site-legacy Legacy website for OSAlt built using flask
  • discordbot-nixiecog Place holder for nixiecog module for the discord bot.
